*) Nur sofern ein Zuzug aus dem Ausland: *) Only in cases where the child has moved to Germany from abroad. Please enter here the date from which the child has been living in Germany uninterrupted.
Das Vorhandensein der Kinder und ihre Zu: The existence of children and their membership of the household must be officially proven. The Household Certificate (Haushaltsbescheinigung) on the next page serves this purpose.
Es wird hiermit bescheinigt, dass die un: I hereby certify that according to my personal knowledge, the person named in Section A and the children listed under the serial numbers ... to ... in these documents reside at the specified address.
Füllen Sie deshalb bitte den Abschnitt A: Therefore please fill out Section A legibly. In Section B, the details you submit are confirmed by the responsible registration authority (Einwohnermeldeamt) or another public body with an official seal or stamp.
Haben Sie Kinder in Ihrem Antrag auf Kin: If you have listed children in your application for child benefit who live outside of your household long-term (and not merely occasionally), please provide a life certificate (Lebensbescheinigung) for them. If they are completing education or vocational training, an educational or vocational training certificate may be provided instead. However, it may be no more than six months old. You can obtain the corresponding form from your Family Benefits Office.
Kindergeld kann Ihnen grundsätzlich für: Child Benefit can in principle be paid to you for each of the children belonging to your household. A child qualifies as a member of your household if the child is living in your household continuously, is raised and cared for by you, and is provided for out of your household's means. The registration of a child at a registering authority does not in itself prove that the child belongs to your household. The child still qualifies as a member of your household during temporary periods spent living outside the home for educational or vocational training purposes.
Name: Surname
Name und Vorname der kindergeldberechtig: Surname and first name of the person entitled to child allowance
Name und Vorname des Kindes: Surname and first name of the child
Näheres finden Sie dazu im Merkblatt übe: You can find more detailed information regarding this in the Child Benefit Fact Sheet (Merkblatt über Kindergeld).
Telefonische Rückfrage tagsüber unter Nr: Telephone number during the day in case of questions:
Tragen Sie bitte nachstehend in der Reih: Please enter the details of the children belonging to your household that are listed in your application for child benefit/questionnaire below, in the order of birth beginning with the eldest.
Zu meinem Haushalt unter der oben angege: The following children are members of my household at the aforementioned address:
zur Vorlage bei der Familienkasse: For submission to the Family Benefits Office
